hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# # Module settings # MODULE=CXF-BINDIST-AS-6.0.0-SPRING-SUN-JDK-6
WORKSPACE=`pwd` STACK_ID=cxf JAVA_HOME=@java.home.sun.jdk6@ SCRIPTS_DIR=$WORKSPACE/hudson-scripts STACK_DIR=$WORKSPACE/stack-cxf TEST_OPTS= JBOSS_TARGET=jboss600 JBOSS_BIND_ADDRESS=@jboss.bind.address@ JBOSS_CONFIG=@jboss.server.instance@ JBOSS_INSTANCE=@hudson.home@/jobs/AS-6.0.0/workspace/JBossAS-6.0.0/build/target/@hudson.jboss600.build@
# # load test functions # . $SCRIPTS_DIR/jbossws-qa.sh
# # execute binary distribution tests # binaryDistributionTestWithSpring

project.description: Build and test jbossws-cxf-@version.id@ binary distribution against AS-6.0.0 with SpringFramework libraries available and Sun JDK 6
